sudoku

Class SwingSudoKiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.SwingSudoKiller

  • public class SwingSudoKiller
extends java.lang.Object
    Graphical Sudoku game solver. The user should fill the board with the puzzle to solve and click the 'Start' button (or type 'ALT-s') to get the solution.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniele Mazzocchio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SwingSudoKiller(SwingSudokuBoard ssb)
      Draw the game board.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean guess(int row, int col)
      Test all candidate numbers for a given cell until the board is complete.

    • Method Detail

      • guess

        public boolean guess(int row,
            int col)
        Test all candidate numbers for a given cell until the board is complete.
        Parameters:
        row - Cell's row.
        col - Cell's column.
        Returns:
        false if no legal numbers are found for this cell.
